title: Wilson named to watch list for Brooks Wallace Award - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Wilson named to watch list for Brooks Wallace Award - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: LUBBOCK, Texas – Texas Tech senior shortstop Kurt Wilson was named to the initial 2022 Brooks Wallace Award watch list, the College Baseball Foundation announced Tuesday. The award honors the nation's top shortstop.
